segments.text: I'd like to go to Suzhou next week . Do you know how to get there by train ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: First , you should check the schedule and see which trains go to Suzhou . Make sure which train you want to take and book a ticket .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . Do you know how much the ticket is ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It depends on which train do you take .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is it far from here to Suzhou ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it stops more than ten times on the way to Suzhou .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long will it take to get there ?
segments.speaker: S1
